fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, throw a Piss Bottle at a player. Since urine is illegal in this world, they are roleblocked while the cops get involved.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with no Piss Bottles.
- At night, if no one visits you, you gain 1 Piss Bottle.
- You appear suspicious if you have Piss Bottles. (Possession of urine is a felony.)
- RB and control immune
